Replace.Text: Tallulah
Integration Movement
Integration Movement
Shouting Light

Military Units [ICON_Gold] Maintenance Cost -1. All units recover [ICON_Damaged] health at the end of each turn when operating in hostile territory without having to stay there, and recover an additional 5 [ICON_Damaged] health in the Industrial Age. All cities gain +15% [ICON_Culture] cultural output, and +30% [ICON_Culture] cultural output in the Golden Age.
Guerrilla warfare
Land military units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement, and ignore the [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty from hills and rivers.
Material reorganization furnace

Initially unlocked, it can provide [ICON_Production] productivity for the city. After construction is completed, the city can carry out special projects. After completing the scientific theory, it will produce an additional 2 points of science value [ICON_Science], 1 point of culture value [ICON_Culture] and 1 point of influence.
Originium Fusion Reactor

Replaces a Factory, with its [ICON_Production] Production bonus extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles (provided they don't already receive a bonus from another building of this type). It also provides an additional +3 [ICON_Production] Production, [ICON_Power] Electricity, and +1 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Amenities] Amenities to the city for each improved Strategic Resource.
Shield Guard
Replaces the Swordsman, has higher [ICON_Fortified] defense than the Swordsman; and has [ICON_Fortified] defense equivalent to 2 turns of stationing without the need to station.
Snow Monster Squad
Replaces the Rifleman, requires no strategic resources, and deals 10 damage to surrounding enemy units at the end of each round.
Road Levelers

Replaces the Special Forces, with higher [ICON_Strength] attack damage and range, +2 [ICON_Movement] movement in all situations and can move after attacking. Additional +10 [ICON_Strength] attack damage when attacking cities. Restores +10 when stationed in an enemy cell.
Reorganization of matter

Can be carried out in any city with a Matter Recombination Reactor. Upon completion, pollution (carbon emissions) is reduced by 30 points, and the city gains +3 [ICON_Science] technology and +3 [ICON_Production] productivity output, and provides +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity.
Ocean Trade with Terra
Can be played in any city with a port, consuming [ICON_Food] food and providing [ICON_Gold] gold per turn, providing 300 [ICON_Gold] gold upon completion.
Contact Rhode Island
Can be launched in any city with an Airport, providing [ICON_Science] Technology and [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn, and [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points upon completion.
Recruiting Terra Volunteers
Can be started in any city with an airport, providing [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn, and [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points upon completion.
Originium Disease Treatment
Available after unlocking the Public Health tech, completing the project restores [ICON_Damaged] health to all units and provides +4 [ICON_PressureUp] loyalty to the city.

The original idea of ​​the Integration Movement originated from the social status of the infected. As an incurable disease, the infected will face great resistance from non-infected people when integrating into society.

In order to pursue economic interests and other factors, some countries have introduced policies that have further squeezed the living space of infected people and further intensified the gap and conflict between the two groups.

Although there were many infected and non-infected people protesting and looking for peaceful solutions to the plight of the infected, there were still many infected people who were full of hatred for society, and their idea of ​​uniting to try to solve the plight of the infected through violent means created the initial integration movement.

After escaping from the Koschei territory and the Ursus village where she had been hiding for a long time, the leader of the Reunion Movement, Tallulah, moved through the northern wilderness of Ursus while gathering infected people along the way. She eventually joined forces with the Froststar Snow Monster Squad and the Patriot guerrillas to establish the original "Reunion Movement."

In order to gain more living space, Tallulah decided to lead the integration movement to the south where the natural conditions are milder, and recruited more infected people along the way, including Mephisto, Faust and others. After contacting Lyudmila the Regicide and Alex the Bonebreaker, who are familiar with Chernobyl, Tallulah decided to set her target on Chernobyl...
The leader character of this module comes from the game "Arknights" produced by Hypergryph Network, and some of the art materials of the game are used.
Integration Movement
Previously active in Ursus
Unknown
No base yet
{LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_REUNION_TALULAH_SUBTITLE}
The integration movement welcomes sincere friends
If you interact with us now, you will only be harmed by the Originium.
You have been so open and sincere to us from Terra that we want to announce our friendship to the world together with you.
The earth is not picky when it comes to eating us, but we will face it together.
Let’s talk about it next time.
Do you want to be turned into ice slag, crushed by an iron shield, or turn into ashes?
The Reunification Movement will burn away all the chains that bind people.
The flame will not sleep forever, unless the cold night ends!
You put out the fire, but unless someone ends the winter nights, it will reignite across the fields.
Welcome to the paradise for mineral patients.
It's not the right time yet.
The Integration Movement's envoys have brought you spicy candies, vodka, kvass and sausages. Would you like to try them?
You are timid in the face of suffering, but you act domineeringly in front of your peers!
You are as sinister and despicable as the old black snake Kosice, disgusting. [NEWLINE] (Condemn you)

You have discovered the paradise for those who are sick of the Ore Stone. If you are willing to have friendly exchanges with us, we will treat you sincerely; but if you are also a rat or a bloodthirsty jackal, we will let you experience firsthand the pain that the Originium can bring.
Do you seem believable and open to friendship from another world?
It looks like we can all use some of our resources to help each other out. Want to see some specialties from another continent?
Hello.
You seem like a trustworthy friend.
(You are a ray of warm light on this earth.)
You've been a little confused lately.
(Disappointing guy.)
The Integration Movement needs reliable and sincere allies like you.
The bleeding should have stopped.
Your sins have not yet been atoned for.
We have all suffered enough from the death of our comrades, it is time to stop the fighting.
May your expedition go well.
You can come to our home anytime.
Your kindness is not enough.
Please help us and let the Terrans find a place to settle down in more distant places.
Your troops stationed on my border are disturbing, if you want to keep the peace please remove them.
I think we will all receive satisfactory goods.
Not fair enough.
Do you seem credible and willing to accept friendship from another world? [NEWLINE] (Swap capital positions)
Tallulah

Talulah, you were born to enjoy the glory brought by two noble bloodlines. There are only a few nobles in Terra who can stand shoulder to shoulder with you. But what is more noble than your bloodline is your noble belief. Surrounded by the graceful and beautiful, you give enthusiasm and affection to the suffering Originium patients, and give up your noble status to find warm spring with the dying people on the tundra. [NEWLINE]The black snake once blinded your mind, but that history was just a nightmare. Please return to reality. A new world is open to you and the Reunion Movement. We must stand firm in this short warming, find a way to defeat Originium disease, and return to the earth from our new home, so that the warm sun will shine on all of Terra from the long winter of Ursus. Talulah, leader of the Reunion Movement, are you willing to lead us to explore a correct path and liberate our compatriots together with comrades who pursue light?

She is the leader of the Integration Movement and the spiritual beacon of the entire Integration Movement. She transformed the Integration Movement from a useless underground organization of infected people into what it is today.

Don’t ask whether the bonfire should burn, ask first whether the cold and darkness are still there; don’t ask whether the bullets should be loaded, ask first whether oppression and exploitation are still there; don’t ask whether the just cause has a tomorrow, ask first whether injustice in the world still exists today.

Tallulah and Chen are half-sisters. Their father Edward is Wei Yanwu's sworn brother, and their mother is Wei Yanwu's sister. When Wei Yanwu was young, he was fighting for Longmen with his mortal enemy Duke Kosice. Kosice interfered and forced Wei Yanwu to kill Edward himself (the details are still unknown). One day 20 years ago, Kosice returned to Longmen and threatened Wei Yanwu with blowing up half of Longmen, and took away the young Tallulah.

Several years later, Tallulah was raised by Kosche as an adopted daughter and heir in Ursus, and served Kosche in his organization "Black Snake". Tallulah, who gradually saw the evil side of Kosche, took the initiative to insert the Originium fragment into her arm to become an infected person in order not to inherit Kosche's will, and successfully assassinated Kosche, but Kosche used the spiritual Originium technique on Tallulah in advance and continued to entangle Tallulah. Once Tallulah began to agree with Kosche's ideas, she would become "him". The story that followed is very familiar to everyone, but there are also variables... This is a new world.
Tallulah, wipe out all the injustice in this world!
Tallulah, show your sword to those who oppress and exploit you!
{LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_REUNION_TALULAH_QUOTE}
